nodes.text: Rona Riggs's mother was a female Human living on Ord Mantell with her husband during the Cold War. She was the mother of Rona Riggs and the aunt of Corso Riggs. When Corso left home to join the Peace Brigade, Rona left home with him. During the Separatist War on Ord Mantell she and her husband were killed by the Separatist forces.
Rona Riggs's mother is mentioned briefly in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Corso Riggs companion mission.
